title: MD
biography: Thermal paper is a special fine paper that is coated with a material formulated to change color locally when exposed to heat. It is used in thermal printers, particularly in inexpensive devices, such as adding machines, cash registers, credit card terminals and small, lightweight portable printers.
aiSummary: Ramaiah Muthyala is a trauma systems specialist with an H-index of 15 at Orthopedics (Member). Has been published in International journal of molecular sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
